reuters.title: BASS GROUP SAYS IT HAS HAD TALKS ON SEEKING CONTROL OF TAFT BROADCASTING
reuters.body: Video Display Corp said it signed agreements with <Glowtronics <Ltd> to jointly build a manufacturing plant in the state of Karnatake, India. Video Display said the plant, in which it will own a 40 pct equity interest, will make cathodes, filament heatrers and electron gun assembles for television sets. Reuter 
